title: Westcott 8" All Purpose Value Stainless Steel Straight Scissors, Red
description: Westcott All Purpose Value Stainless Steel Straight Scissors feature lightweight stainless steel blades. These scissors are equipped with comfortable plastic handles. Bent scissors ideal for light duty use, cutting through paper, ribbon, and photos. Westcott Tools are some of the finest products of their kind for students and professionals. Our commitment to meticulous quality and cutting edge innovation in measurement and art materials has earned an unparalleled reputation.
